text.__SUMMARY__:
Cardamine lojanensis is a species of flowering plant in the family Brassicaceae.
It is found only in Ecuador.
Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: León-Yánez, S. & Pitman, N. (2003). "Cardamine lojanensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2003: e.T42821A10756085. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2003.RLTS.T42821A10756085.en. Retrieved 20 December 2017.
